class.rdfs:comment: A specific object or file containing a Legislation. Note that the same Legislation can be published in multiple files. For example, a digitally signed PDF, a plain PDF and an HTML version.
class.rdfs:label: LegislationObject

schema:legislationLegalValue.rdfs:comment: The legal value of this legislation file. The same legislation can be written in multiple files with different legal values. Typically a digitally signed PDF have a "stronger" legal value than the HTML file of the same act.
schema:legislationLegalValue.rdfs:label: legislationLegalValue
